div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Lato;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Pomona Unified is committed to the continuity of learning for all students, including students with disabilities to the extent feasible during this unprecedented time. For these initial two weeks before Spring Break,

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: PUSD is provi

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ding you and your child online

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: resources

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: during this unprecedented time

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Below you will find a collection of links to online resources, grouped by grade

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: spans/instructional level

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Many of these

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: pre-approved resources

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: are used in the classroom and will continue to be available to our students. They

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: are also accessible on personal devices.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: We are encouraging students to continue the use of these PUSD supported online resources during this time.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you for

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-weight: normal;

p.span: your understanding and support

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: P

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: El Distrito Escolar Unificado de Pomona está comprometido en continuar el aprendizaje durante el cierre de escuelas para todos los estudiantes, incluyendo estudiantes con discapacidades, en la medida posible durante este tiempo sin precedentes. Durante estas dos semanas iniciales antes de las vacaciones de Primavera, PUSD proporcionará recursos en línea para usted y su hijo. A continuación encontrará una colección de links a recursos en línea según el grado/nivel de instrucción. Muchos de esto recursos pre-aprobados se utilizan en el salón de clase y seguirán estando disponibles para nuestros estudiantes. Los links también son accesibles en dispositivos personales. Muchas gracias

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Bitter; text-decoration: underline;

a.strong: Technology Support for Students and Staff

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter;
span.strong: THE TECHNOLOGY DRIVE-THROUGH SERVICE WILL BE OPEN BEGINNING APRIL 14TH BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE FILL OUT THE FORM FROM LINK ABOVE TO BE PROVIDED AN APPOINTMENT DAY AND TIME.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: For the past three weeks, since the school closures were announced, PUSD staff has worked diligently to provide resources to those students and staff in need. Due to the current COVID-19 directives and to ensure the safety of our school families, staff members and their families, the Pomona Unified School District Student and Staff Device Support Drive-through Service was closed for one week. The Service will re-open BY APPOINTMENT ONLY beginning on Tuesday, April 14th. In order to be provided an appointment please fill out the Form in order to ensure we are capturing District needs, however we encourage all to seek alternate means to access your instructional resources during this time of crisis. If you have an issue that can be resolved through remote tech support, please call the Technology Helpline at (909) 397-4800 ext. 23780. Thank you.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

a.strong: Necesidades Tecnológicas de Estudiantes y Personal

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: ATENCIÓN: EL SERVICIO DE TECNOLÓGICA SE ABRIRÁ A PARTIR DEL 14 DE ABRIL SOLOMENTE POR CITA. POR FAVOR LLENE EL FORMULARIO DESDE EL ENLACE ARRIBA PARA SER PROPORCIONADO UN DÍA Y HORA DE LA CITA.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Durante las últimas tres semanas, desde que se anunciaron los cierres de escuelas, el personal de PUSD ha trabajado diligentemente para proporcionar recursos a los estudiantes y el personal que lo necesitan. Debido a las directivas actuales de COVID-19 y para garantizar la seguridad de las familias de nuestras escuelas, los miembros del personal y sus familias, el servicio de asistencia para estudiantes y personal del Distrito Escolar Unificado de Pomona estuvo cerrado por una semana. Este Servicio estará abierto a partir del 14 de abril

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Para obtener una cita, complete el

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: según lo que el estudiante necesite para asegurarse de que estamos capturando las necesidades del Distrito, sin embargo, recomendamos a todos a buscar medios alternativos para que tenga algo durante este tiempo de crisis. Si tiene un problema que se puede resolver a través del soporte técnico remoto, llame a la Línea de ayuda tecnológica al (909) 397-4800 ext. 23780. Gracias.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
